attributes.action: have a binding referendum, on the day of the next general election, on whether to change to a more proportional electoral system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of the people who do not vote at elections fail to do so because their vote is of so little value. Even those who do are frustrated by the fact that most seats are effectively decided in advance so they are acting out of civic duty rather that any conviction that their vote can make a difference. It is vital for a healthy democracy that people feel their votes will count.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
